subject: Soccer
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Ivaylo Petev, the new coach of the Bulgarian team Levski Sofia, quit on Wednesday, one day after hostile fans forced him to give up his club shirt and accused him of supporting a rival team.
snippet: Ivaylo Petev, the new coach of the Bulgarian team Levski Sofia, quit on Wednesday, one day after hostile fans forced him to give up his club shirt and accused him of supporting a rival team.
